name: YouTube: reduce clickbaitiness
description: userstyles.org crops the screenshot and there is no good way around this. Uncropped version Removes all views, likes, and subscription numbers from Youtube for a cleaner experience without pre-judgements. "I don't think there's any disagreement that Netflix would be worse if they had view numbers next to all of the shows, it causes you to prejudge... [With Youtube] you can't come to it just as a thing to be consumed and taken on its own" - CGP Grey, Hello Internet Podcast #109 Inspired by CGP Grey & Brady Haran of Hello Internet podcast.
additional_info:
2021-07-03 – updated selectors for recent YouTube redesigns.
2021-05-28 – updated selectors for recent YouTube redesigns.

2018
Based on user script by Tom Lum: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/372545-grey-vision
css:
@-moz-document domain("youtube.com") {
.view-count,
.short-view-count,
.super-title .yt-simple-endpoint.style-scope.yt-formatted-string,
#top-level-buttons yt-formatted-string[id='text'],
ytd-sentiment-bar-renderer,

ytd-subscribe-button-renderer span,
ytd-comments-header-renderer,
count-text,
#vote-count-middle,
#metadata-line .style-scope,
#subscriber-count,
#subscribers,
#metadata-line,
/* 2021-07-03 update */
.ytd-video-primary-info-renderer .top-level-buttons-computed .ytd-toggle-button-renderer,
.ytd-video-primary-info-renderer .top-level-buttons-computed .ytd-toggle-button-renderer ytd-badge-supported-renderer,
#info .ytd-toggle-button-renderer yt-formatted-string,
#owner-sub-count
{
	display: none !important;
}
    
}
